m:MaterialTitle.title: Raised
m:MaterialTitle.description: The raised button is a standard button that signify actions and seek to give depth to a mostly flat page.

g:HTMLPanel.pre: <m:MaterialButton text="Button" waves="light" color="blue" /> <m:MaterialButton text="Button" waves="light" color="blue" icon="mdi-action-account-circle" iconPosition="left"/> <m:MaterialButton text="Button" waves="light" color="blue" icon="mdi-action-account-circle" iconPosition="right"/>

m:MaterialTitle.title: Floating
m:MaterialTitle.description: The floating circular action button is meant for very important functions.

g:HTMLPanel.pre: <m:MaterialButton type="floating" waves="light" size="large" color="blue" icon="mdi-content-add" /> <m:MaterialButton type="floating" waves="light" size="large" color="blue" icon="mdi-action-account-circle"/>

m:MaterialTitle.title: Flat
m:MaterialTitle.description: Flat buttons are usually used within elements that already have depth like cards or modals.

m:MaterialTitle.title: Large
m:MaterialTitle.description: This button has a larger height for buttons that need more attention.

g:HTMLPanel.pre: <m:MaterialButton text="Button" waves="light" color="blue" size="large"/> <m:MaterialButton text="Button" waves="light" color="blue" icon="mdi-action-account-circle" iconPosition="left" size="large"/> <m:MaterialButton text="Button" waves="light" color="blue" icon="mdi-action-account-circle" iconPosition="right" size="large"/>

m:MaterialTitle.title: Large
m:MaterialTitle.description: This button has a larger height for buttons that need more attention.

g:HTMLPanel.pre: <m:MaterialButton text="Button" icon="mdi-action-account-circle" iconPosition="left" size="large" disable="true"/> <m:MaterialButton text="Button" icon="mdi-action-account-circle" iconPosition="left" disable="true"/> <m:MaterialButton text="Button" type="flat" disable="true"/> <m:MaterialButton type="floating" icon="mdi-action-account-circle" disable="true"/>

m:MaterialTitle.title: Fixed Action Button
m:MaterialTitle.description: If you want a fixed floating action button, you can add multiple actions that will appear on hover. Our demo is in the bottom righthand corner of the page.

g:HTMLPanel.pre: <m:MaterialFloatingContainer> <m:initial><m:MaterialButton type="floating" waves="light" size="large" color="blue" icon="mdi-action-account-circle"/></m:initial> <m:item><m:MaterialButton type="floating" waves="light" color="green" icon="mdi-action-account-circle"/></m:item> <m:item><m:MaterialButton type="floating" waves="light" color="red" icon="mdi-action-account-circle"/></m:item> <m:item><m:MaterialButton type="floating" waves="light" color="orange" icon="mdi-action-account-circle"/></m:item> <m:item><m:MaterialButton type="floating" waves="light" color="blue" icon="mdi-action-account-circle"/></m:item> </m:MaterialFloatingContainer>
